languages.text: "Это все ты... Проклятая псина!" {n}Каллигос замахивается на архмилитанта, но тот с грацией гадюки избегает смертельного удара.{/n} "Я был к тебе милостив, а ты все это время осквернял мою душу? Заставлял меня..."

traits.locale_text: "Это все ты... Проклятая псина!" {n}Каллигос замахивается на архмилитанта, но тот с грацией гадюки избегает смертельного удара.{/n} "Я был к тебе милостив, а ты все это время оквернял мою душу? Заставлял меня..."

languages.text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"
languages.original_text: "Это все ты... Проклятая псина!" {n}Каллигос замахивается на архмилитанта, но тот с грацией гадюки избегает смертельного удара.{/n} "Я был к тебе милостив, а ты все это время осквернял мою душу? Заставлял меня..."

traits.locale_text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I had been merciful, and you was corrupting my soul this entire time? Making me..."

"This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I had been merciful, and you was corrupting my soul this entire time? Making me..."

"This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I had been merciful, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Making me..."

"This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"

"This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"

languages.text: «Todo esto es obra tuya... ¡tuya, maldito perro sarnoso!». {n}Calligos asesta un hachazo al Archimilitante, pero este elude el mortífero golpe con la agilidad de una víbora.{/n} «Fui piadoso contigo, y todo este tiempo has estado corrompiendo mi alma. Obligándome a...».
languages.original_text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"

traits.locale_text: «Todo esto es obra tuya... ¡tuya, maldito perro sarnoso!». {n}Calligos asesta un hachazo al archimilitante, pero este elude el mortífero golpe con la agilidad de una víbora.{/n} «Yo que fui piadoso, y todo este tiempo has estado corrompiendo mi alma. Obligándome a...».

languages.text: “原来都是你干的……你这该死的杂种！”{n}卡里戈斯挥起斧头，砍向首席战士，但他以毒蛇般的优雅躲过了这致命一击。{/n}“我一直待你不薄，可你却一直在腐化我的灵魂？迫使我——”
languages.original_text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"

traits.locale_text: “原来都是你干的……你这该死的杂种！”{n}卡里戈斯挥起斧头，砍向首席战士，但他以毒蛇般的优雅躲过了这致命一击。{/n}“我一直待你不薄，可你却一直在腐化我的灵魂？让我……”

languages.text: « Tout est de ta faute... misérable bâtard ! » {n}Calligos tente de frapper l'archimilitant de sa hache, mais ce dernier évite le coup mortel avec la grâce d'un serpent.{/n} « Je t'ai pris en pitié et, pour me remercier, tu corromps mon âme ? Tu m'as fait... »
languages.original_text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"

traits.locale_text: « Tout est de ta faute... misérable bâtard ! » {n}Calligos tente de frapper l'archimilitant de sa hache, mais ce dernier évite le coup mortel avec la grâce d'un serpent.{/n} « Je t'ai pris en pitié et, pour me remercier, tu corromps mon âme ? Tu m'as fait... »

languages.text: 「これは、すべてお前の仕業だ…惨めな野郎だ！」{n}カリゴスはアーク・ミリタントに斧を振り下ろしたが、彼は毒蛇のように優雅にその致命的な一撃を避けた。{/n}「俺は慈悲を与えたというのに、お前はずっと俺の魂を堕落させていたというのか？俺を無理やり…」
languages.original_text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"

traits.locale_text: 「これは、すべてお前の仕業だ…惨めな野郎だ！」{n}カリゴスはアーク・ミリタントに斧を振り下ろしたが、彼は毒蛇のように優雅にその致命的な一撃を避けた。{/n}「俺は慈悲を与えたというのに、お前はずっと俺の魂を堕落させていたというのか？俺を無理やり…」

languages.text: "Das ist alles Euer Werk ... Ihr verfluchter Hund!" {n}Calligos schwingt mit seiner Axt nach dem Erzmilitanten, doch dieser weicht dem tödlichen Hieb mit der Anmut einer Viper aus.{/n} "Ich war gnädig und Ihr habt die ganze Zeit über meine Seele korrumpiert? Mich gezwungen -"
languages.original_text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist alles Euer Werk ... Ihr verfluchter Hund!" {n}Calligos schwingt mit seiner Axt nach dem Erzmilitanten, doch dieser weicht dem tödlichen Hieb mit der Anmut einer Viper aus.{/n} "Ich war gnädig und Ihr habt die ganze Zeit über meine Seele korrumpiert? Mich zu ..."

languages.text: "Hepsi senin eserin... Seni aşağılık it!" {n}Calligos, baltasını Başmilitan'a savuruyor ancak Başmilitan, bir engerek zarafetiyle ölümcül darbeden kaçınıyor.{/n} "Sana merhamet gösterdim ve sen, bunca zaman ruhumu yozlaştırmakla mı meşguldün? Beni nelere zorladın?.."
languages.original_text: "This is all your doing... You wretched cur!" {n}Calligos swings his axe at the Arch-Militant, but he evades the mortal blow with the grace of a viper.{/n} "I showed you mercy, and you have been corrupting my soul this entire time? Forcing me—"
